product_name: Advanced Elements Xcelerator Hand Pump with Gauge
long_description: Ideal for inflatables that require high pressure, this single-action hand pump is designed with an aluminum alloy shaft, a rigid handle and a rubber-protected pressure gauge for great durability.
short_description: Ideal for inflatables that require high pressure, this single-action hand pump is designed with an aluminum alloy shaft, a rigid handle and a rubber-protected pressure gauge for great durability.
